name: OG Foxy
description:
Description:

Short platformer with Foxy as a main character. 

By avoiding enemies and traps, try to make it out alive!

_____________________________________________________________

Controls:

A, D => Walk

Space =>Jump

Ctrl => Crouch

Ctrl + Space => Small jump

Space + Foxy falling => Air jump / double jump

You can also grab the wall while falling and going towards it. Wall grabbing gives you ability to climb walls or jump from them. Crouch to let go of the wall.

_____________________________________________________________

I developed this game in 3 weeks for learning purposes using free assets. 

All C&C are welcome and have fun playing my game!
